item.title: 洛克希德-马丁公司盈利超出预期，并确认 2024 年展望
item.description: 洛克希德-马丁公司第一季度营业收入超出预期，因为该公司交付了更多的战斗机和导弹系统。【原文：Lockheed Martin Corp.’s first-quarter operating income beat expectations as it delivered more fighter jets and missile systems.】

item.title: 石油褪去中东恐惧溢价太快
item.description:
基准布伦特期货重回每桶87美元下方，但冲突仍对供应构成风险。【原文：

Benchmark Brent futures are back below $87 a barrel, but the conflict continues posing risks to supply.

item.title: 英国央行首席经济学家称对降息持谨慎态度
item.description: 英国央行首席经济学家休-皮尔（Huw Pill）表示，他在决定何时下调英国利率时持谨慎态度，称官员们需要继续警惕通胀持续存在的风险。【原文：Bank of England Chief Economist Huw Pill said he’s erring on the side of caution in deciding when to cut UK interest rates, saying officials need to remain on guard for risks that inflation persists.】

item.title: 炼油厂陷入困境，俄罗斯原油出口保持增长
item.description:
洪水和无人机对炼油厂的袭击可能有助于保持流量

。【原文：

Flooding and drone strikes on refineries likely help to keep flows elevated

】

item.title: 前外汇局局长称日本 "非常接近 "进行干预
item.description: 据日本一位前高级货币官员称，如果日元进一步走软，日本即将采取货币干预措施。【原文：Japan is on the brink of currency intervention if the yen weakens any further, according to one of the country’s former top currency officials.】

item.title: 迭戈-梅吉亚千禧基金计划在米兰设立办事处
item.description: 前千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）投资组合经理迭戈-梅吉亚（Diego Megia）的新对冲基金正在意大利设立办事处，与其他同行一起寻求利用欧洲国家提供的税收优惠政策。【原文：Former Millennium Management portfolio manager Diego Megia’s new hedge fund is setting up an office in Italy, joining peers seeking to take advantage of the tax incentives offered by the European country.】

item.title: 德国因房地产价值问题调查 "无瑕疵 "银行债券
item.description: 德国银行业监管机构 BaFin 正在对贷款人用于担保债券（即 Pfandbriefe）的不动产进行仔细审查，这是一个 4000 亿欧元的市场，传统上被认为是最安全的信贷市场之一。【原文：Germany’s banking watchdog BaFin is taking a closer look at the real estate used by lenders to secure covered bonds known as Pfandbriefe, a €400 billion market traditionally considered among the safest in credit.】

item.title: 中东忧虑缓解，新兴市场股市持续回升
item.description: 由于中东紧张局势似乎有所缓和，且欧洲经济体的数据显示经济活动更加强劲，新兴市场股市连续第二天上涨。【原文：Emerging-market stocks rose for a second day as the tensions in the Middle East appeared to ease and data from European economies showed stronger activity.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。股市反弹步伐加快，财报季拉开序幕，苹果公司在中国的 iPhone 销量大幅下滑。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. The rebound in stocks gathers pace, earnings season kicks into gear and Apple sees iPhone sales in China dive. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 第二艘滞留俄罗斯的埃及小麦船在等待三周后起航
item.description: 一艘埃及小麦船在等待正确手续三周后获准启航，因为俄罗斯最大的谷物贸易商之一与当地监管机构之间的纠纷继续扰乱出口。【原文：An Egyptian wheat ship has been allowed to sail after waiting three weeks for the correct paperwork, as a dispute between one of Russia’s top grain traders and a local regulator continues to disrupt exports.】

item.title: 反弹后中国买盘停滞，铜面临回调风险
item.description: 铜在接近每吨 10,000 美元的强劲涨势中面临考验，因为全球最大市场中国的买家对接近两年来最高点的价格望而却步。【原文：Copper’s powerful rally close to $10,000 a ton is facing a test as buyers in China, the world’s biggest market, balk at prices near their highest in two years.】

item.title: 石油期权显示地缘政治风险溢价正在迅速消退
item.description: 石油期权市场显示，交易商已经平仓了中东地区前所未有的导弹和无人机袭击所带来的一大笔地缘政治溢价。【原文：Oil options markets are indicating that traders have unwound a hefty chunk of the geopolitical premium stemming from unprecedented missile and drone attacks in the Middle East.】

item.title: 重组有望实现，美国银行发现乌克兰债券价值
item.description: 博雅证券公司（BofA Securities）的策略师认为，乌克兰的美元债券有明显的上涨空间，因为在美国 610 亿美元援助计划取得突破后，该国仍有望与债权人达成重组协议。【原文：Ukraine’s dollar bonds offer notable upside as the nation remains on track to agree a restructuring deal with creditors following a breakthrough on a $61 billion US aid package, according to strategists at BofA Securities.】

item.title: 奥伦进一步揭示其瑞士部门如何损失 4 亿美元
item.description: 波兰最大的企业 Orlen SA 石油公司更详细地说明了其设在瑞士的贸易部门是如何损失近 4 亿美元来购买从未兑现的石油的。【原文：Poland’s largest business, the oil company Orlen SA, set out a more detailed account of how it says its Swiss-based trading unit managed to lose almost $400 million purchasing oil that never materialized.】

item.title: 高盛集团鲁布纳称美股回调尚未结束
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Brace for more declines in stock markets, warns Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s tactical specialist Scott Rubner.】

item.title: 复星集团旗下菲达利称计划于 2025 年进行首次公开募股
item.description: 由中国复星国际有限公司控股的葡萄牙保险公司 Fidelidade-Companhia de Seguros SA 表示，该公司计划于 2025 年进行首次公开募股。【原文：Fidelidade-Companhia de Seguros SA, a Portuguese insurer controlled by China’s Fosun International Ltd., said it’s planning to carry out an initial public offering in 2025.】

item.title: 范围》称部分欧元区主权评级面临压力
item.description: 范围评级公司（Scope Ratings）认为，一些欧元区国家未能修复公共财政正在危及其信用状况，该公司特别挑选了法国和比利时进行审查。【原文：A failure of some euro-area countries to repair public finances is jeopardizing their credit status, according to Scope Ratings, which singled out France and Belgium for particular scrutiny.】

item.title: 帕内塔称中东冲突可能破坏能源市场稳定
item.description: 意大利银行行长法比奥-帕内塔（Fabio Panetta）警告说，如果中东战争蔓延开来，可能会产生后果。【原文：Bank of Italy Governor Fabio Panetta warned of the potential fallout should the war in the Middle East spread.】

item.title: 印度监管机构就阿达尼股票操纵行为质询全球基金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度资本市场监管部门已要求投资阿达尼集团股票的多家全球基金针对不当披露和操纵市场的指控进行辩护。【原文：India’s capital markets regulator has asked a clutch of global funds that had invested in Adani Group stocks to defend themselves against allegations of improper disclosures and market manipulation, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 市场下跌损害投资回报，中国平安利润下滑
item.description: 由于股市下跌和债券收益率下降侵蚀了投资回报，中国平安保险（集团）股份有限公司第一季度利润下降了 4.3%。【原文：Ping An Insurance (Group) Co.’s profit dropped 4.3% in the first quarter as stock-market declines and falling bond yields eroded investment returns.】

item.title: 慕尼黑再保险公司称本季度业绩强劲更有可能实现目标
item.description: 慕尼黑再保险公司（Munich Re）表示，由于弥补重大损失的支出温和，加上强劲的投资业绩，该公司第一季度利润大幅增长，可能会超过今年的利润目标。【原文：Munich Re said it might beat its profit target for the year after first-quarter profit jumped amid benign expenditures to cover major losses and a strong investment result.】

item.title: 凯雷的库里说，石油价格有望达到 100 美元，大宗商品是 "双赢 "之举
item.description: 资深分析师杰夫-库里（Jeff Currie）认为，大宗商品价格攀升反映了经济的强劲增长，因此对投资者来说是 "双赢 "之举。【原文：Commodities look like a “win-win” for investors as climbing prices reflect vigorous economic growth, according to veteran analyst Jeff Currie.】

item.title: 嘉佩科特将利用小型企业维持 127,428% 的 30 年涨幅
item.description: 凯普泰克银行控股有限公司（Capitec Bank Holdings Ltd.）是南非自民主时代以来表现最好的股票，它希望利用其零售银行业务战略来发展商业银行和保险业务。【原文：Capitec Bank Holdings Ltd., South Africa’s best-performing share since the advent of democracy, wants to use its retail banking strategy to grow its business banking and insurance units.】

item.title: 特朗普又将获得 13 亿美元尚未出售的股票
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的媒体初创公司通过空头支票交易上市，在达到一定的目标后，他将再获得 13 亿美元的股票，而他目前仍无法从合并中获得暴利。【原文：The blank-check deal that brought Donald Trump’s media startup public is set to give him another $1.3 billion in stock after meeting certain targets to his present windfall from the merger, yet he remains unable to cash any of it in.】

item.title: 匈牙利表示支持潜在的俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司赞助协议
item.description: 匈牙利政府表示支持俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）与匈牙利顶级足球队之间的赞助协议，该协议将凸显布达佩斯与莫斯科保持联系的努力。【原文：The Hungarian government signaled backing for a reported sponsorship deal between Russia’s Gazprom PJSC and the country’s top soccer team, an agreement that would spotlight Budapest’s efforts to maintain ties with Moscow.】

item.title: 对冲基金亿万富翁的资金帮助了一家 "掠夺性 "贷款公司
item.description:
一个人创办了一家现金垫付公司。另一个是退休的投资传奇人物。一家私人信贷基金满足了两人的需求。【原文：

One man started a cash-advance company. The other was a retired investing legend. A private credit fund had what both were looking for.

】

item.title: 巴克莱调查称泰晤士河水务公司债券减值有蔓延风险
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）对投资者进行的一项调查显示，如果泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）的高级债券持有人最终面临亏损，英国水务行业可能很难吸引到新的融资。【原文：The UK’s water industry may struggle to attract fresh financing should Thames Water’s senior bondholders end up facing losses, according to a survey of investors by Barclays Plc.】

item.title: 萨索尔公司在南非生产基地发生标志性故障后业绩下滑
item.description: 合成燃料和化学品生产商沙索公司（Sasol Ltd.）报告了其在南非的整个运营过程中出现的问题，该公司股价创下了三个多月来的最大跌幅。【原文：Sasol Ltd. shares fell the most in more than three months after the synthetic fuel and chemical maker reported issues throughout its South African operations.】

item.title: 英国 PMI 好于预期，经济从衰退中复苏势头增强
item.description: 英国经济在第二季度伊始出人意料地加快了从衰退中复苏的步伐，私营企业报告了近一年来最强劲的增长。【原文：The UK economy’s recovery from recession unexpectedly gathered pace at the start of the second quarter as private sector firms reported the strongest growth in almost a year.】

item.title: 肖尔茨称欧盟银行需要具备跨集团转移资本的能力
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）表示，欧盟的银行应该能够在整个集团内自由流动资本，这也响应了许多银行业高管提出的要求。【原文：German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said that banks in the European Union should be able to move their capital freely throughout the bloc, echoing a demand voiced by many executives in the sector.】
